ðŸ“– Summary: Clime is a Go library designed to simplify the creation of visually appealing and interactive command-line interfaces. It offers a range of features including terminal utilities, rich text formatting, interactive spinners, progress bars, data tables, user input prompts, and responsive design to enhance the user experience in terminal applications.
